title: Grand Portage National Monument: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                 Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     October 16, 2015  Meeting to Solicit Public Comments on the Draft Environmental Assessment (EA) for Historic Meadow  Grand Portage National Monument Will Hold Public Meeting to Solicit Public Comments on the First Draft of the  Environmental Assessment for Historic Meadow Area   February 26, 2014  Maiingan Wolf Tells a Grand Portage Story  Isle Royale Maiingan Wolf Tells a Grand Portage Story   April 10, 2013  Grand Portage National Monument Amends 2013 Opening Due to Sequestration  Operating season and hours have  changed slightly because of federal sequestration budget cuts   July 17, 2012  Book Signing-Ancient Earth and the First Ancestors-A Cultural and Geological Journey  Book Signing: Ancient Earth and the First Ancestors: A Cultural and Geological Journey by Ron Morton and Carl Gawboy in the Heritage Center at Grand Portage National Monument   July 04, 2012  Sister Sites Agreement  'Sister Sites' Arrangement Reaches Across the Border March 2012 - Lisa Radosevich-Craig   April 25, 2012  Rendezvous With History-A Grand Portage Story  New Park Film Debuts at Grand Portage National Monument Heritage Center   September 27, 2011  Grand Portage National Monument Opening Community Elders Craftwork Exhibit  Grand Portage National Monument is proud to announce the opening of a new exhibit featuring brief biographies of seventeen Grand Portage Community Elders and examples of their craftwork produced as part of the monumentâ€™s Cultural Demonstration program during 1968-2002.  There will be an open house for the exhibit on Tuesday, October 4 from 5-7 p.m. at the Heritage Center.
